metadata.title: USN-6183-2 -- Bind vulnerability
metadata.description: USN-6183-1 fixed vulnerabilities in Bind. This update provides the corresponding updates for Ubuntu 14.04 LTS, Ubuntu 16.04 LTS and Ubuntu 18.04 LTS.  Original advisory details:   Shoham Danino, Anat Bremler-Barr, Yehuda Afek, and Yuval Shavitt discovered  that Bind incorrectly handled the cache size limit. A remote attacker could  possibly use this issue to consume memory, leading to a denial of service.  (CVE-2023-2828)    It was discovered that Bind incorrectly handled the recursive-clients  quota. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Bind to  crash, resulting in a denial of service. This issue only affected Ubuntu  22.04 LTS, Ubuntu 22.10, and Ubuntu 23.04. (CVE-2023-2911)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6183-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libisc160 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 libisccc-export140-udeb - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 libdns162 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 libbind-dev - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 libbind9-140 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 libisccc-export140 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 libisccfg-export140 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 bind9 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 libisc-export160 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 bind9-doc - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 libbind-export-dev - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 libisccc140 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 host - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 libisccfg140 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 bind9-host - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 dnsutils - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 libdns-export162 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 bind9utils - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 liblwres141 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 libirs141 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 libirs-export141 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 lwresd - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.19+esm6 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
